title: Bug 41059WebAppClassLoader clearReferences code break running threads
description: Bug 41059WebAppClassLoader clearReferences code break running threads
OB: When the WebAppClassLoader stops it manually sets all static and finalvariables to null in the clearReferences method.This results in NPEs for anythread that was not stopped and not expecting its final or static variables tobe null.This is particularly a problem with hot deploys since the unloadfails and terminating the deploy.
